artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Hayashiya Shōgorō; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: date seal: 子八 {ne hachi} (Rat 8); censor seals:  村田 {Murata}, 衣笠 {Kinugasa}; carver's seal: 彫竹 {hori Take}; publisher's seal: 庄 {Shō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Jiraiya gōketsu monogatari 児雷也豪傑譚語, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1852, 7th month.
title: Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō VIII as Naofuku Maki Takarago, actually Jiraiya
